mapper.select: SELECT j_idx, u_idx, j_name, j_category, j_title, j_content, j_date, j_filenum, j_vcount, j_reple FROM ( SELECT j_idx, u_idx, j_name, j_category, j_title, j_content, j_date, j_filenum, j_vcount, j_reple, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY j_idx DESC)AS rnum FROM board) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
